articles.title: Elton Jantjies breaks silence on Springbok end-year tour snub: 'I fully understand the decision' | Sport - News24
articles.description: Elton Jantjies says he "fully understands and supports" the decision to leave him out of the national team’s end-year European tour, adding that he sought professional help to get his personal life and career back on track.
articles.content:
• Elton Jantjies says he "fully understands and supports" the decision to leave him out of the national team’s end-year European tour.

articles.title: Europe to ask for homegrown lander for troubled ExoMars rover - Space.com
articles.description: Russia was supposed to provide the landing platform, but it's no longer part of the ExoMars program.
articles.content: The science goals set for Europe's beleaguered ExoMars rover are still unique,  European Space Agency (ESA) officials said, as they laid down plans to ask member states to fund a new homegrown descen… [+3890 chars]

articles.title: EU to give 18 bln euros to Kyiv next year to help run Ukraine - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union will give Kyiv 1.5 billion euros a month in 2023 to help run Ukraine as it fights back Russia's invading troops, the head of the bloc's executive said on Friday.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, Oct 21 (Reuters) - The European Union will give Kyiv 1.5 billion euros a month in 2023 to help run Ukraine as it fights back Russia's invading troops, the head of the bloc's executive said … [+3327 chars]
